A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Nope.  Not a good movie.  Could have been and should have been but wasn't.  It was like going to the prom with your cousin.  Should be a magical night\, but you're with your cousin.

Really bad new characters took screen time away from developing the ones from The Force Awakens.  I could have done without the casino scene and Rose completely.  I actually found myself grinding my teeth in frustration everytime she was on screen because we had to endure her anti-capitalist lectures when we could have seen super awesome Star Wars kind of battles with lightsabers or something else epic.

Not worth your time or money.  See it on Netflix.
